title: Alliances & Enemies
description: Who's on whose side in New Orleans?

questions.question: Who does Marcel ultimately end up with romantically?
questions.explanation: Marcel and Rebekah's love story spans centuries, and they finally end up together in the series finale.

questions.question: Davina Claire was once an enemy of the Mikaelsons.
questions.explanation: Davina initially opposed the Mikaelsons due to her alliance with Marcel and hatred of Klaus for killing her friend Tim.

questions.question: Who is Cami O'Connell to Klaus?
questions.explanation: Cami is a psychology grad student who becomes Klaus's confidante, therapist, and eventually his love.

questions.question: Who does Hayley marry?
questions.explanation: Hayley marries Jackson Kenner to unite the werewolf packs, though her heart belongs to Elijah.

questions.question: Who becomes Kol's love interest and later wife?
questions.explanation: Kol and Davina fall in love, and they eventually get married in the series.

questions.question: Vincent Griffith eventually becomes an ally to the Mikaelsons.
questions.explanation: Despite initial conflicts, Vincent works with the Mikaelsons to protect New Orleans from greater threats.

questions.question: What is the relationship between Klaus and Marcel?
questions.explanation: Klaus rescued and raised Marcel, treating him as a son, though their relationship is complicated.

questions.question: Who kills Klaus in the series finale?
questions.explanation: Klaus and Elijah stake themselves with the white oak stake to destroy The Hollow and protect Hope.
